body_text:
In #802 we added data collection for recipe executions and failures. Now we need to make this data available via the Normandy API.
Some sample use cases of this API:

Displaying overall success/failure counts on the detail page for a recipe.
Graphing execution rates over time for a single recipe.
Alerting when failure rates rise above a threshold for a given period of time.

Todo:

 Design API for getting uptake information
 Design method for pulling uptake data from telemetry into Normandy
 Determine whether this API can be public, or needs to be limited to the admin node only, which is behind the VPN.

title: Collect and expose aggregate uptake counts via the API
body:
In #802 we added [data collection for recipe executions and failures](http://normandy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user/data_collection.html). Now we need to make this data available via the Normandy API.

Some sample use cases of this API:
- Displaying overall success/failure counts on the detail page for a recipe.
- Graphing execution rates over time for a single recipe.
- Alerting when failure rates rise above a threshold for a given period of time.

Todo:
- [ ] Design API for getting uptake information
- [ ] Design method for pulling uptake data from telemetry into Normandy
- [ ] Determine whether this API can be public, or needs to be limited to the admin node only, which is behind the VPN.
